Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the character that you control and use to play the game
    Author:
    jadonlam

                 int g,
                 int b)
        Draws the player on the screen
        Parameters:
        drawer - The PApplet drawer used to draw the player on the screen
        images - the set of images you draw
        currentFrame - the current image you draw
        hasFlag - if the player has the flag
        r - your rgb "r" value
        g - your rgb "g" value
        b - your rgb "b" value

      • shoot

        public void shoot(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                  processing.core.PImage[] images,
                  int frame,
                  Grid mazeGrid,
                  Direction d,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  int gridX,
                  int gridY)
        Shoots a fireball in the direction of the player
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet that the shot will be drawn on
        images - the array of images of the shot
        frame - the frame of the image of the shot
        mazeGrid - the maze
        d - the direction of the shot
        x - the x value of the shot originally
        y - the y value of the shot originally
        gridX - the 2D int x coordinate of the shot
        gridY - the 2D int y coordinate of the shot
